name: Japanese Verbs
description: JAPANESE VERBS This is the app provides a list of the Japanese verb commonly used in elementary Japanese.  1. Quick view RU - Show verb dictionary-form (). NAI - Show verb nai-form (). TE - Show verb te-form (). TA - Show verb ta-form ().  2. Verb conjugation - Present - Negative - Past - TE form - Volitional - Potential - Imperative - Causative - Conditional - Passive  3. Support to speech with TTS (Text to speech of Google) 4. Create group of verbs. 5. Study with Flash card.
